comment: Smart data models - TubeBundle schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.S4BLDG/master/TubeBundle/schema.json
description: A tube bundle is a device consisting of tubes and bundles of tubes used for heat transfer and contained typically within other energy conversion devices, such as a chiller or coil.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: foulingFactor
contents.comment: Property. Fouling factor of the tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in m2 Kelvin/Watt.

contents.name: hasManufacturer
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: hasModel
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: hasTurbulator
contents.comment: Property. TRUE if the tube has a turbulator, FALSE if it does not.

contents.name: horizontalSpacing
contents.comment: Property. Horizontal spacing between tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: inLineRowSpacing
contents.comment: Property. In-line tube row spacing. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: insideDiameter
contents.comment: Property. Actual inner diameter of the tube in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: length
contents.comment: Property. The finished length of the device. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nominalDiameter
contents.comment: Property. Nominal diameter or width of the tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: numberOfCircuits
contents.comment: Property. Number of parallel fluid tube circuits.

contents.name: numberOfRows
contents.comment: Property. Number of tube rows in the tube bundle assembly.

contents.name: outsideDiameter
contents.comment: Property. Actual outside diameter of the tube in the tube bundle. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: staggeredRowSpacing
contents.comment: Property. Staggered tube row spacing. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: thermalConductivity
contents.comment: Property. Fouling factor of the tubes in the tube bundle. Usually measured in m2 Kelvin/Watt.

contents.name: verticalSpacing
contents.comment: Property. Vertical spacing between tubes in the tube bundle.Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: volumen
contents.comment: Property. Total volume of fluid in the tubes and their headers. Usually measured in cubic metre (m3).

contents.name: isSubSystemOf
contents.comment: Relationship. A reference to a system(s) that this Physical Object is part of.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
